options.cartocss: #indigenous_areas{   polygon-opacity: 1;   polygon-fill:transparent;   line-color: #000000;   line-width: 0.4;   line-opacity: 1;   polygon-pattern-file: url(http://com.cartodb.users-assets.production.s3.amazonaws.com/patterns/donuts_4px_med.png);   polygon-pattern-opacity: 1; }

#brazil_protected{   polygon-opacity:1;   polygon-fill:transparent;   line-color: #000000;   line-width: 0.1;   line-opacity: 1;   polygon-pattern-file: url(http://com.cartodb.users-assets.production.s3.amazonaws.com/patterns/dots_2px_med.png);   polygon-pattern-opacity: 0.7; }

#silos[zoom>5]{   marker-fill-opacity: 0.8;   marker-line-color: #FFF;   marker-line-width: 1;   marker-line-opacity: 1;   marker-width: 10;   marker-file: url(http://com.cartodb.users-assets.production.s3.amazonaws.com/simpleicon/building22.svg);   marker-fill: transparent;   marker-allow-overlap: false; } #silos [ cap_t >= 0][zoom>5] {    marker-fill: #5CA2D1; } #silos [ cap_t >= 1499.5][zoom>5] {    marker-fill: #3E7BB6; }  #silos [ cap_t >= 3168.5][zoom>5] {    marker-fill: #2167AB; } #silos [ cap_t >= 16580.5][zoom>5] {    marker-fill: #0F3B82; } #silos [ cap_t >= 31470][zoom>5] {    marker-fill: #081B47; }
